question: The newly inaugurated DNA analysis centre in Chandigarh was established under which fund?
explanation: DNA Analysis Centre in Chandigarh, which was recently inaugurated, was set up under the Nirbhaya Fund Scheme. This centre will provide facility for Sexual Assault and Homicide Unit, Paternity Unit, Human Identification Unit and Mitochondrial DNA unit. It will be well-equipped with modern DNA Profiling tools and equipment. It has the capacity to examine 2000 cases per year.
